name: Haunted Mansion
desc: You stand before a spooky mansion with creaking doors and eerie lights.

name: Dark Corridor
desc: A long, dimly lit corridor filled with mysterious shadows.

name: Forgotten Cemetery
desc: An ancient cemetery with moss-covered tombstones and a chilling silence.

name: Gloomy Library
desc: A library shrouded in darkness, with dusty shelves and whispering books.

name: Mysterious Altar
desc: A hidden altar surrounded by mystical symbols and an otherworldly energy.
